dialogueLines.line: I'll admit you're good, but this is only first round.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: You'll have to win against me in at least twenty more rounds before you can even think of going home.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Oh hey, I found where you hid my gun.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Err...I was saying that you can go home now.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Great. This was a huge waste of time.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Just go. I don't want to see your face anymore.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma
